concept: Total number of enterprises, cultural sector (CLT)
transformation: Cultural sector uses CLT aggregate (nace_r2=CLT) from sbs_ovw_act

concept: Total number of enterprises, music sector minimum
transformation: Aggregated over NACE codes (music minimum) from sbs_sc_ovw; size_emp=TOTAL

concept: Total number of enterprises, music sector maximum
transformation: Aggregated over NACE codes (music maximum) from sbs_sc_ovw; size_emp=TOTAL
